title: Update C++ API tests to use Catch2
body_html:
This PR updates the C++ API (autogradpp) tests to use Catch2 instead of lest. It also removes the lest header file.

Things I had to change:

  • s/EXPECT/REQUIRE
  • Update test structure to match Catch2's style, which is having one TEST_CASE per concept (e.g. RNN), and then SECTIONs for specific tests (e.g. LSTM)
  • Renamed <test>_t.cpp to <test>.cpp

See test/cpp/api/README.md and main.cpp for how we handle CUDA tests.

Mainly for @ebetica and @jgehring to review

body:
This PR updates the C++ API (autogradpp) tests to use Catch2 instead of lest. It also removes the lest header file.

Things I had to change:
- `s/EXPECT/REQUIRE`
- Update test structure to match Catch2's style, which is having one `TEST_CASE` per concept (e.g. `RNN`), and then `SECTION`s for specific tests (e.g. `LSTM`)
- Renamed `<test>_t.cpp` to `<test>.cpp`

See `test/cpp/api/README.md`  and `main.cpp` for how we handle CUDA tests.

Mainly for @ebetica  and @jgehring to review
